designs.title: Gradient Mesh Hero
designs.description: Animated OKLCH gradient mesh with drifting color blobs, noise texture overlay, and bold typography. Pure CSS animation via @property.

designs.title: Glassmorphism Cards
designs.description: Three frosted glass cards on a rich gradient background with ambient orb glow and hover lift effects.

designs.title: Analytics Dashboard
designs.description: Full analytics dashboard with KPI stat cards, CSS-only animated bar chart, activity feed, and orders table.

designs.title: Floating Pill Navigation
designs.description: Centered floating navbar with a sliding pill indicator that smoothly tracks the active item. Keyboard accessible.

designs.title: Multi-Step Wizard Form
designs.description: 3-step wizard with animated progress stepper, slide transitions, toggle switches, and confirmation summary.

designs.title: Bento Grid Feature Showcase
designs.description: Mixed-size CSS Grid bento layout with warm earth tones — sand, terracotta, and forest green. Stats, icons, testimonials, and image cells.

designs.title: Neon Pricing Table
designs.description: 3-tier cyberpunk pricing columns with neon cyan and magenta glow effects on true black. Pulsing badge and staggered feature animations.

designs.title: Testimonial Marquee
designs.description: CSS-only dual-row infinite marquee with testimonial cards scrolling in opposite directions. Cream and sage editorial palette.

designs.title: Split Login Screen
designs.description: 50/50 split-screen login with deep indigo decorative panel and clean white form side. Social auth buttons and floating shapes.

designs.title: Premium Mega Footer
designs.description: Stripe-style mega footer with gradient accent border, 4-column nav grid, newsletter signup, and social icons on near-black.

designs.title: Kinetic Typography Hero
designs.description: Word-by-word CSS animation hero with monochrome palette and single red accent word. Typography IS the design — zero gradients.

designs.title: Toast Notification Stack
designs.description: 4 toast variants (success, error, warning, info) with CSS slide-in animation, progress bars, and semantic color coding.

designs.title: Vertical Sidebar Navigation
designs.description: Discord/Linear-style collapsible sidebar with emerald active indicator, expandable teams section, notification badges, and mobile drawer.
